title: Security Breach at PlayDapp: A $31 Million Cyber Attack Shakes the Blockchain Gaming World
description: In the rapidly evolving world of blockchain and cryptocurrency, security incidents can have significant repercussions, not just for the entities directly involved but for the broader market as well.  A recent event that underscores the vulnerability is the hacker attack on the blockchain gaming platform, PlayDapp.. title: Mina Protocol Advances with Testworld 2.0 and Mainnet Upgrade
description: In a significant move within the blockchain arena, Mina Protocol, renowned for its innovative approach as a lightweight blockchain solution, has made headlines with its announcement regarding the progression of Testworld Mission 2.0 and the anticipated upgrades to its mainnet.  Spearheaded by the proficient team at O(1) Labs, these developments herald a new phase of […]

title: UN investigates DPRK hacking groups for $3B crypto cyberattacks
description: The United Nations (UN) is investigating hacking groups linked to the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea (DPRK) for allegedly orchestrating cyberattacks on cryptocurrency firms over six years, accumulating profits estimated at around $3 billion.  According to recent reports by Reuters, which cite unpublished UN documents, an independent sanction committee oversees the investigation into these DPRK-linked […]

title: Ethereum Alert: China’s ETH Holdings Threaten Crypto Stability
description: China’s CCP’s dominance in the Ethereum ecosystem remains a topic of concern for community members. According to TruthLabs, CCP is the largest hidden whale on the network. Cryptocurrency community members have long voiced their concerns over China’s position in the Ethereum ecosystem. title: Latest Report Shows XRPL NFT Mints Explode 491% in Q4 2023
description:

The report highlighted a staggering surge in the creation of non-fungible tokens (NFTs) during this period.
